fact: The first iron rings were given out in 1922 as part of the first Rituals administered in Canada.

The Iron Ring is worn on the little finger of the working (dominant) hand. There, the facets act as a sharp reminder of one's obligation while the engineer works, because it would drag on the surface while the engineer is drafting or writing.
I'm part of the Archives! We preserve and share skule history. Check us out at archives.skule.ca
